 1999-01361999-02-040,  ,  FAIT,  , 
PrecisAuthority for the Minister of Foreign Affairs (a) to sign an AGREEMENT with the REPUBLIC OF BULGARIA for the AVOIDANCE of DOUBLE TAXATION and the PREVENTION OF FISCAL EVASION with respect to TAXES ON INCOME, or (b) to issue an Instrument of Full Powers authorizing other Canadian officials to sign the Agreement on behalf of the Government of Canada.
